thread.section_title: B&H Photo-Video Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of B&H Photo-Video | www.bhphotovideo.com | 123 of 7163
thread.title: Jeff D
thread.title_full: B&H Photo-Video reviewed by Jeff D

author: Jeff D
title: Jeff D
text:
Easy to order online or by phone, knowledgeable staff and easy to work with customer service.
Once I wanted to return item that was not really what I wanted, no problem,
Once I returned something that did not work properly, exchanged immediately.
I have purchased 4 Nikon lenses and two camera bodies and have been more that satisfied with shipping, packing, delivery and accuracy of orders.
